headline: Goldman Sachs Loves 5 Energy Stocks Offering Dividends and Big Growth Potential
summary: Energy stocks have surged in 2026, driven by a confluence of favorable factors. Oil prices have remained elevated near $70 per barrel, as OPEC+ production discipline has tightened global supply while demand from Asia, particularly China and India, continues to recover and grow. Geopolitical tensions in the Middle East and Eastern Europe have added risk ... Goldman Sachs Loves 5 Energy Stocks Offering Dividends and Big Growth Potential

headline: Vistra shares are trading higher after Jefferies upgraded the stock from Hold to Buy and raised its price target from $191 to $203.
summary: Vistra shares are trading higher after Jefferies upgraded the stock from Hold to Buy and raised its price target from $191 to $203.
